rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;9726a974.1502">   <title>Beltane Breakfast Event - Scottish Year of Food & Drink - 26 Feb @ QMU </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;9726a974.1502</link>   <description> Dear Beltane subscribers,<br><br>We are delighted to announce the full speaker line-up for our next Beltane Breakfast, this time focusing on the Scottish Year of Food and Drink.<br><br>Beltane Breakfast: Scottish Year of Food and Drink<br>Thursday 26 February 2015, 08:30 - 10:30<br>Queen Margaret University, Piano Bar<br><br>Derek Ball, Heriot Watt University: &quot;Food to improve human performance&quot;<br>Isobel Davidson, Queen Margaret University: &quot;Translating food research for community engagement&quot;<br>Sue Gordon, Queen Margaret University: &quot;The experience and benefits of working with QMU researchers&quot;<br>Ken Aitchison, Queen Margaret University: &quot;The Diet Phone&quot;<br>Nicola Stock, The Roslin Institute: Developing and delivering an [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-18T13:33:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>SCANLON Elizabeth</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;9726a974.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;4261a4ec.1502">   <title>Re: Beltane Breakfast event - International Year of Light </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;4261a4ec.1502</link>   <description> Hi Heather<br><br>I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve just noticed that this is on Wednesday 11 Feb! When i booked on Eventbrite - i saw the date 10 Feb and was so pleased, since Tuesdays are good days for me. I have just realised 10 Feb was the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdbooking end\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd date.<br>I won\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdt be able to attend on the Wednesday - it is my operating day\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd.so sorry not to have noticed this and so disappointed to miss this. Hope someone else can use my place.<br>Speak soon [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-06T08:36:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Felicity Mehendale</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;4261a4ec.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;94aa927f.1502">   <title>FW: Social Mobility Foundation - job opportunity </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;94aa927f.1502</link>   <description> Dear colleagues<br><br>I would appreciate it if you could please circulate this opportunity to anyone you think would be interested. This is a great (post) graduate opportunity.<br><br>http://www.socialmobility.org.uk/about-us/vacancies/app-coordinator-glasgow/<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Melanie<br><br>Melanie Smith<br><br>Widening Participation Officer    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-05T15:27:32+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>SMITH Melanie</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;94aa927f.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;4c4efbf0.1502">   <title>Beltane Breakfast event - International Year of Light </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;4c4efbf0.1502</link>   <description> Dear Beltane subscribers,<br><br>We are delighted to announce another exciting Beltane Breakfast, this time focusing on the International Year of Light 2015.<br><br>This is a great opportunity to exchange ideas with your peers, meet colleagues interested in running events linked to the IYL15, and find out more about Beltane and how you can get involved. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-03T09:22:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Mara G\ufffd\ufffdtz</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EDINBURGHBELTANE;4c4efbf0.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item
